mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '待派工' WHEN '2' THEN '待接单' WHEN '3' THEN '待签到' WHEN '4' THEN '待完工' WHEN '5' THEN '待评价' WHEN '6' THEN '待审核' WHEN '7' THEN '已完工' END stateName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime, a.contacts, a.phone, a.customer_name customerName, c.user_name receiver, a.type, CASE a.type WHEN '1' THEN '微信报单' ELSE '用户报单' END typeName, d.user_name declarationName FROM crm_service a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff d ON a.declaration_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.service_user_id = c.user_id, crm_service_type b WHERE a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.state = 1 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.service_user_id = #{receiver} AND a.state = 2 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.service_user_id = #{receiver} AND a.state = 3 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.service_user_id = #{receiver} AND a.state = 4 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.service_user_id = #{receiver} AND a.state = 5 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.state = 5 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, b.`name` serviceTypeName, a.customer_name customerName, a.product_name productName, CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.state = 6 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum, #工单号 b.`name` serviceTypeName, #服务类型 a.customer_name customerName, #客户名称 a.product_name productName, #产品名称 CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime #报单时间 FROM crm_service a, crm_service_type b WHERE a.state = 7 AND a.type_id = b.id ORDER BY a.declaration_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum,#工单号 IFNULL(b.`name`, '') serviceTypeName,#服务类型 a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '待派工' WHEN '2' THEN '待接单' WHEN '3' THEN '待签到' WHEN '4' THEN '待完工' WHEN '5' THEN '待评价' WHEN '6' THEN '待审核' WHEN '7' THEN '已完工' END stateName,#工单状态 CASE a.parent_id WHEN '0' THEN '主工单' ELSE '子工单' END workOrderClassification,#工单类别 CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime,#报单时间 a.contacts,#联系人 a.phone,#联系电话 a.email, #邮箱 a.qq, #qq a.customer_id customerId, #客户id a.customer_name customerName,#客户名称 IFNULL(o.`name`, '') addressProvince,#省 IFNULL(p.`name`, '') addressCity,#市 IFNULL(q.`name`, '') addressArea, #区、乡、县 IFNULL(r.`name`, '') addressTownship, #镇、街道 IFNULL(a.address_detailed, '') addressDetailed,#详细地址 a.product_id productId,#产品id IFNULL(a.product_name, '') productName,#产品名称 IFNULL(a.product_norms, '') productNorms,#规格型号 IFNULL(a.product_serial_num, '') productSerialNum,#序列号 CASE a.product_warranty WHEN '1' THEN '保内' WHEN '2' THEN '保外' else '' END productWarranty,#质保类型 IFNULL(e.`name`, '') faultName,#故障类型 c.`name` urgencyName,#紧急程度 a.content,#服务内容 f.`name` modeName,#处理方式 IFNULL(g.user_name, '') receiver,#工单接收人 IFNULL(a.cooperation_user_id, '') cooperationUserId,#工单协助人 IFNULL(a.sheet_picture, '') sheetPicture,#上传照片 IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo,#上传附件 IFNULL(d.com_pic, '') comPic,#完工拍照 IFNULL(d.com_enclosure_info, '') comEnclosureInfo,#完工附件 IFNULL(d.com_remark, '') comRemark,#完工备注 CASE a.type WHEN '1' THEN '微信报单' WHEN '2' THEN '用户报单' END comeType, #来源 IFNULL(h.reason, '') reason,#改派原因 IFNULL(i.address, '') registerAddress, #签到地址 IFNULL(i.remark, '') remark, #签到备注 IFNULL(j.remark, '') receiptRemark, #接单备注 IFNULL(j.subscribe_time, '') subscribeTime,#实际开工时间 IFNULL(d.com_time, '') comTime,#实际完工时间 IFNULL(d.com_work_time, '') comWorkTime,#工时 IFNULL(d.com_execution, '') comExecution, #完成情况 IFNULL(format(d.material_cost, 2), '') materialCost, #应收客户材料费 IFNULL(format(d.cover_cost, 2), '') coverCost, #应收客户服务费 IFNULL(format(d.other_cost, 2), '') otherCost,#应收客户其他费 IFNULL(format(d.all_price, 2), '') allPrice, #应收客户合计 IFNULL(k.`name`, '') evaluateTypeName, #评价类型 IFNULL(s.content, '') evaluateContent, #评价内容 t.user_name createName #工单创建人 FROM crm_service a LEFT JOIN crm_service_fault d ON a.id = d.service_id LEFT JOIN crm_service_fault_type e ON d.type_id = e.id LEFT JOIN crm_service_transfer h ON a.id = h.service_id LEFT JOIN crm_service_register i ON a.id = i.service_id LEFT JOIN crm_service_receipt j ON a.id = j.service_id LEFT JOIN t_area o ON a.address_province = o.id LEFT JOIN t_area p ON a.address_city = p.id LEFT JOIN t_area q ON a.address_area = q.id LEFT JOIN t_area r ON a.address_township = r.id LEFT JOIN crm_service_evaluate s ON a.id = s.service_id LEFT JOIN crm_service_evaluate_type k ON k.id = s.type_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff t ON a.create_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff g ON a.service_user_id = g.user_id, crm_service_type b, crm_service_urgency c, crm_service_mode f WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.type_id = b.id AND a.urgency_id = c.id AND a.mode_id = f.id
SELECT id, file_name name, file_address fileAddress FROM sys_enclosure WHERE instr(concat(',', #{enclosureInfo},','),concat(',', id, ','));
SELECT id, file_name name, file_address fileAddress FROM sys_enclosure WHERE instr(concat(',', #{comEnclosureInfo},','),concat(',', id, ','));
SELECT b.user_id id, b.user_name `name`, b.email FROM crm_service a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',',a.cooperation_user_id,','),CONCAT(',',b.user_id,','))

SELECT a.material_id materialId, a.material_name materialName,#配件名称 a.material_model materialModel,#配件规格 CASE b.unit WHEN '1' THEN b.unit_name ELSE d.`name` END unitName,#商品计量单位 SUM(a.oper_number) operNumber,#使用数量 FORMAT(a.unit_price, 2) unitPrice, #单价 FORMAT(a.all_price, 2) allPrice, #总金额 a.remark #备注 FROM crm_service_fault_use_material a, erp_material b, erp_material_norms c LEFT JOIN erp_unit d ON d.id = c.unit_id WHERE a.service_id = #{id} AND a.material_id = b.id AND a.m_unit_id = c.id GROUP BY a.m_unit_id

SELECT a.id, b.`name` typeName,#反馈类型 a.content,#反馈内容 a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo,#反馈附件 c.user_name feedbackUserName,#反馈人 CONVERT(a.create_time, CHAR) feedbackCreateTime #反馈时间 FROM crm_service_feedback a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.create_id = c.user_id, crm_service_feedback_type b WHERE a.service_id = #{id} AND a.type_id = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT into crm_service (id, service_time, order_num, declaration_time, declaration_id, customer_id, customer_name, contacts, phone, email, qq, address_province, address_city, address_area, address_township, address_detailed, type_id, product_id, product_name, product_norms, product_serial_num, product_warranty, mode_id, content, urgency_id, service_user_id, cooperation_user_id, sheet_picture, enclosure_info, state, type, parent_id, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{serviceTime}, #{orderNum}, #{declarationTime}, #{declarationId}, #{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{contacts}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{areaId}, #{townshipId}, #{addressDetailed}, #{typeId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productNorms}, #{productSerialNum}, #{productWarranty}, #{modeId}, #{content}, #{urgencyId}, #{serviceUserId}, #{cooperationUserId}, #{sheetPicture}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{state}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.type_id typeId,#服务类型 CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime,#报单时间 a.customer_id customerId,#客户id a.customer_name customerName,#客户名称 a.contacts,#联系人 a.phone, a.email, a.qq, a.address_province provinceId,#省 a.address_city cityId,#市 a.address_area areaId,#区 a.address_township townshipId,#乡镇 a.address_detailed addressDetailed,#详细地址 a.product_id productId,#产品id a.product_name productName,#产品名称 a.product_norms productNorms,#规格型号 a.product_serial_num productSerialNum,#序列号 a.product_warranty productWarranty,#质保类型 a.urgency_id urgencyId,#紧急程度 a.mode_id modeId,#处理方式 a.content,#服务内容 a.service_user_id serviceUserId,#工单接收人 a.sheet_picture sheetPicture,#相关照片 a.enclosure_info enclosureInfo FROM crm_service a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT b.user_id id, b.user_name `name`, b.email FROM crm_service a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.service_user_id = b.user_id
SELECT a.id, a.state FROM crm_service a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum,#工单号 IFNULL(b.`name`, '') serviceTypeName,#服务类型 CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime,#报单时间 a.contacts,#联系人 a.phone,#联系电话 a.email, #邮箱 a.qq, #qq a.customer_name customerName,#客户名称 IFNULL(o.`name`, '') addressProvince,#省 IFNULL(p.`name`, '') addressCity,#市 IFNULL(q.`name`, '') addressArea, #区、乡、县 IFNULL(r.`name`, '') addressTownship, #镇、街道 IFNULL(a.address_detailed, '') addressDetailed #详细地址 FROM crm_service a LEFT JOIN t_area o ON a.address_province = o.id LEFT JOIN t_area p ON a.address_city = p.id LEFT JOIN t_area q ON a.address_area = q.id LEFT JOIN t_area r ON a.address_township = r.id, crm_service_type b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.type_id = b.id AND a.state = 1
